LanguageData.RPGrapheneNanoSuit.label: Graphene Nanosuit
LanguageData.RPGrapheneNanoSuit.description: A metallic body garment constructed using mechanites to arrange Graphene Nano fibres and Hyperweave into an intelligent lattice.
LanguageData.RPGrapheneShieldNanoSuit.label: Graphene Shielded Nanosuit
LanguageData.RPGrapheneShieldNanoSuit.description: A metallic body garment constructed using mechanites to arrange Graphene Nano fibres and Hyperweave into an intelligent lattice. This version is shielded.
